sourcesContent:
import React,{ Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Field, Control, Input, Column, Section, Help, Label } from 'rbx'; import { Redirect, Link } from 'react-router-dom' function RegisterForm(){ const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [redirectToLogin, setRedirectToLogin] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState(false); if(redirectToLogin == true) return return(
setName(e.target.value)} /> setEmail(e.target.value)} /> setPassword(e.target.value)} /> setRedirectToLogin(true)} className="button is-white has-text-custom-purple">Entrar { error && Email ou senha incorretas }
) } export default RegisterForm;
